publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2616 Christine Grahame: South of Scotland Allianceâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the launch of the South of Scotland Alliance, comprised of Dumfries and Galloway Council, Scottish Borders Council, Scottish Enterprise Dumfries and Galloway and Scottish Enterprise Borders; notes its manifesto message "Moving the South of Scotland Forward"; further notes its five key targets of raising the profile and image of the south of Scotland, examining and rectifying the causes of economic market failure, promoting inclusion and equal opportunities, working for increased funding for the area and building international links; recognises that this area in particular has suffered from the consequences of foot-and-mouth disease and has in the past been overlooked, and congratulates the South of Scotland Alliance on its endeavours to rectify these matters. Supported by: Colin Campbell*
S1M-2616 South of Scotland Alliance (lodged on 16 January 2002) Ms Sandra White*, Michael Russell*, Michael Matheson*, Donald Gorrie*, Margaret Jamieson*, Robin Harper*

S1M-2616 Christine Grahame: South of Scotland Alliance-That the Parliament welcomes the launch of the South of Scotland Alliance, comprised of Dumfries and Galloway Council, Scottish Borders Council, Scottish Enterprise Dumfries and Galloway and Scottish Enterprise Borders; notes its manifesto message "Moving the South of Scotland Forward"; further notes its five key targets of raising the profile and image of the south of Scotland, examining and rectifying the causes of economic market failure, promoting inclusion and equal opportunities, working for increased funding for the area and building international links; recognises that this area in particular has suffered from the consequences of foot-and-mouth disease and has in the past been overlooked, and congratulates the South of Scotland Alliance on its endeavours to rectify these matters. Supported by: Colin Campbell, Ms Sandra White, Michael Russell, Michael Matheson, Donald Gorrie, Margaret Jamieson, Robin Harper
S1M-2616 South of Scotland Alliance (lodged on 16 January 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-2616 South of Scotland Alliance (lodged on 16 January 2002) David Mundell*
S1M-2616 South of Scotland Alliance (lodged on 16 January 2002) Fiona McLeod*, Alasdair Morgan*
S1M-2616 South of Scotland Alliance (lodged on 16 January 2002) Mr Murray Tosh*
